April 16, 2020 Board of Education Meeting
div.div: The Agenda for the April 16, 2020 Board of Education Meeting is available at this time. Consistent with Governor Pritzker’s March 16, 2020 Executive Order (2020-07) the meeting of the Board of Education Finance Committee will not admit live audience members for public comment. Visitors’ Comments should be emailed to Kaine Osburn at osburnk@avoca37.org. Emailed comments will be read aloud at the meeting and/or entered into the meeting minutes.
div.a: Read More About April 16, 2020 Board of Education Meeting
April 15, 2020 Finance Committee Meeting
div.div: The Agenda for the April 15, 2020 Finance Committee Meeting is available at this time. Consistent with Governor Pritzker’s March 16, 2020 Executive Order (2020-07) the meeting of the Board of Education Finance Committee will not admit live audience members for public comment. Visitors’ Comments should be emailed to Kaine Osburn at osburnk@avoca37.org. Emailed comments will be read aloud at the meeting and/or entered into the meeting minutes.
div.a: Read More About April 15, 2020 Finance Committee Meeting

a.title: April 2, 2020 Committee of the Whole Meeting

div.a: April 2, 2020 Committee of the Whole Meeting
div.div: The Agenda for the Board of Education Committee of the Whole Meeting is available at this time. Consistent with Governor Pritzker’s March 16, 2020 Executive Order (2020-07) the meeting of the Board of Education will not admit live audience members for public comment and will only have an audio recording published. Visitors’ Comments to the Board for the Public Hearing for the scheduled Board meeting should be emailed to Kaine Osburn at osburnk@avoca37.org. Emailed comments will be read aloud at the meeting and/or entered into the meeting minutes.
div.a: Read More About April 2, 2020 Committee of the Whole Meeting

a.title: March 19, 2020 Public Hearing and BoE Meeting

div.a: March 19, 2020 Public Hearing and BoE Meeting
div.div: The Agenda for the Public Hearing on ELearning Plan and Board of Education Meeting are available at this time. Consistent with Governor Pritzker’s March 16, 2020 Executive Order (2020-07) the meeting of the Board of Education will not admit live audience members for public comment and will only have an audio recording published. Visitors’ Comments to the Board for the Public Hearing for the scheduled Board meeting should be emailed to Kaine Osburn at osburnk@avoca37.org. Emailed comments will be read aloud at the meeting and/or entered into the meeting minutes.
div.a: Read More About March 19, 2020 Public Hearing and BoE Meeting

a.title: Notice of Public Hearing: E-Learning Program

div.a: Notice of Public Hearing: E-Learning Program
div.div: The Board of Education will conduct a Public Hearing on the proposed E-Learning Program on March 19, 2020. The purpose of said hearing will be to receive public comment on the proposed E-Learning Program.
